name: Medieval Multiplayer
description:
Welcome to the dangerous dungeons of Medieval Multiplayer! Collect power-ups, dodge bullets, and scream at your friends in this VS local multiplayer survival game! Pick your skin and survive longer than everyone else to win, first to 10 wins! Supports up to 4 players, controller support, and 2 keyboard players!

Keyboard 1: WASD

Keyboard 2: JIKL

Controller: Left Stick

So, are you ready? Here we go!
